caption: The video shows the duality of a manâ€™s daily life. The video starts from a gang shooting, where two groups of people are shooting at each other. The man detonates a gas tank, and the explosion destroyed the base of the gangsters, thus stopping their fight. Then when the man finish this business, he seems to go back and goes through a normal day. He meets with his leader and talks about some normal issues, after work he goes back home and makes dinner for himself, and he even goes to his friends' kids' birthday party.
